CreateApplicationProxy.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: teo.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateApplicationProxy
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ZoneId": "zone-21xfqlh4qjee",
    "ZoneName": "test.com",
    "ProxyName": "instancd-name",
    "ProxyType": "instance",
    "PlatType": "ip",
    "SecurityType": 1,
    "AccelerateType": 1,
    "ForwardClientIp": "",
    "SessionPersist": false,
    "SessionPersistTime": 3600,
    "Ipv6": {
        "Switch": "on"
    },
    "Rule": [
        {
            "Proto": "TCP",
            "Port": [
                "80",
                "90",
                "99-110"
            ],
            "OriginType": "custom",
            "OriginValue": [
                "1.1.1.1:80"
            ]
        },
        {
            "Proto": "UDP",
            "Port": [
                "999",
                "888",
                "99-110"
            ],
            "OriginType": "custom",
            "OriginValue": [
                "1.1.1.1:80",
                "2.2.2.2:80"
            ]
        }
    ]
}
CreateApplicationProxy.title: 创建应用代理
